tasks.name: linking etcd and etcdctl from {{ etcd_install_dir }} to {{ etcd_install_subdir }}

options.name: linking etcd and etcdctl from {{ etcd_install_dir }} to {{ etcd_install_subdir }}

module_options.etcd_listen_public: {{ "0.0.0.0" if etcd_iface_public == "all" else ansible_default_ipv4.address if etcd_iface_public == "default" else hostvars[inventory_hostname]["ansible_" ~ etcd_iface_public]["ipv4"]["address"] }}
module_options.etcd_listen_cluster: {{ "0.0.0.0" if etcd_iface_cluster == "all" else ansible_default_ipv4.address if etcd_iface_cluster == "default" else hostvars[inventory_hostname]["ansible_" ~ etcd_iface_cluster]["ipv4"]["address"] }}
module_options.etcd_address_public: {{ ansible_fqdn if not etcd_use_ips | bool else ansible_default_ipv4.address if etcd_iface_public is in [ "all", "default" ] else hostvars[inventory_hostname]["ansible_" ~ etcd_iface_public]["ipv4"]["address"] }}
module_options.etcd_address_cluster: {{ ansible_fqdn if not etcd_use_ips | bool else ansible_default_ipv4.address if etcd_iface_cluster is in [ "all", "default" ] else hostvars[inventory_hostname]["ansible_" ~ etcd_iface_cluster]["ipv4"]["address"] }}
